page.title: 01A REVIEW 0F SHEERNESS
page.content: SHEERNESS IS A VICTORIAN TOWN ON THE NORTH-WESTERN EDGE OF THE ISLE OF SHEPPEY. SHEERNESS IS FAMOUS FOR ITS {DOCKS}AND{STEELMILL. THE TOWN IS SMALL,WITH A RANGE OF SMALL SHOPS,BUT FEW CHAINSTORES.{TESCO IS THE LARGEST SUPERMARKET WHICH HAS CLOTHES,PLANTS,D.I.Y.,FOOD AND ITS OWN BAKERY. THERE ARE TWO POPULAR NEW FACILITIES. AN{INDOOR SWIMMING POOL REPLACES THE OUTDOOR ONE AND A{SPORTS {CENTRE}HAS BEEN BUILT ON THE OLD TENNIS COURT SITE. THE APPROXIMATE POPULATION IS 19,766. MAIN EMPLOYMENT IS IN THE DOCKYARD AND STEELMILL.THERE ARE 3 {PRIMARY SCHOOLS}AND 3{MIDDLE SCHOOLS, 5{DOCTOR'S SURGERIES,}3{DENTAL {SURGERIES}AND OTHER ESSENTIAL SERVICES.
